description: The Tartarian aster is an absolutely stunning perennial flower, with its small, star-shaped white flowers brightening any outdoor space. Amazingly, it not only tolerates cold temperatures but also flourishes from mild to extreme cold, making it the perfect choice for many gardens. It’s also quite easy to maintain, as it’s very rarely affected by pests, and it blooms from June throughout autumn. With its stunning displays of white flowers, the Tartarian aster creates an impressive visual feature in any garden, providing a unique and beautiful addition to your landscape.
